privacyProtection.title: 3. Data Usage and Privacy Protection
privacyProtection.privacyPolicyRef: Your privacy is very important to us. The way we collect, use, store and protect your personal information is detailed in our Privacy Policy. The Privacy Policy is an important part of these terms of service and has the same legal effect as these terms.
privacyProtection.dataCollection: Types of information we may collect include but are not limited to:

dataTypes.personalInfo: Personal identification information (such as name, email address)
dataTypes.usageData: Website usage data and interaction patterns
dataTypes.technicalData: Technical information such as IP address, browser type, device information

dataUse.title: Data Use
dataUse.purposes: We use your information for the following purposes:
purposeList: Communicate with you about our services
Ensure website security and prevent fraud

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.measures: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information, including:
securityList: Data encryption during transmission and storage
